jumpPointIntewactionDiawog.noFuel: Youw $fleetOrShip has nyo fuew wemainying and is unyabwe to make a jump.
jumpPointIntewactionDiawog.noExits: The jump point does nyot appeaw to have any functionyaw exits and is effectivewy unyusabwe.

campaignHewp.chmNewgame_text:
Wewcome to the Stawsectow campaign!

You can pwess F5 to quicksave and F9 to quickwoad.

Twy to avoid taking on fweets much biggew than youws, ow onyes that have biggew ships, and pwease wemembew that it's a wowk-in-pwogwess so bugs wiww occasionyawwy happen.

Good wuck!
campaignHewp.chmNewgameIron_text:
Wewcome to the Stawsectow campaign!

Since you'we pwaying in iwon mode, you'ww onwy be abwe to save the game when you exit, and won't be abwe to woad anyothew game without exiting (and saving) youw cuwwent game fiwst.

Twy to avoid taking on fweets much biggew than youws, ow onyes that have biggew ships, and pwease wemembew that it's a wowk-in-pwogwess so bugs wiww occasionyawwy happen.

Good wuck!
campaignHewp.chmDeployCritCR_text:
Some of the ships mawked fow depwoyment awe at dangewouswy wow combat weadinyess (bewow 20%).

Bwinging the systems on these ships to combat powew wevews is wikewy to cause cwiticaw mawfunctions - deawing damage, disabwing some weapons and enginyes fow the duwation of the battwe, and causing fuwthew cwiticaw mawfunctions duwing the depwoyment.

Wunnying these wisks - which incwude the outwight destwuction of a ship - is usuawwy a measuwe of wast wesowt.
campaignHewp.chmDeployLowCR_text:
Some of the ships mawked fow depwoyment awe at wow combat weadinyess (bewow 40%).

Theiw weapon systems and enginyes awe wikewy to suffew mawfunctions and become tempowawiwy disabwed duwing sustainyed use.
campaignHewp.chmDeployCostsCR_text:
You can sewect which ships to depwoy at the beginnying of each battwe, and depwoy weinfowcements as the battwe goes on.

Depwoying a ship weduces its combat weadinyess by a fixed amount. In addition, ships wiww begin to gwaduawwy wose combat weadinyess aftew theiw peak weadinyess time wuns out.

Wecovewing combat weadinyess takes time and consumes vawuabwe suppwies.
campaignHewp.chmWeaponGroups_text:
You've made changes to the ship's woadout, but have nyot adjusted the weapon gwoups.

Weapons wiww be automaticawwy assignyed to gwoups when you depwoy the ship fow combat, but it's a good idea to make the assignments manyuawwy.
campaignHewp.chmOpenTrade_text:
In the cawgo/twade scween, you can:

- Weft-cwick to pick up a stack
- Shift-cwick to pick up items fwom a stack onye at a time
- Shift-cwick and howd, then dwag to pick up a specific quantity
- Contwow-cwick to twansfew an entiwe stack without picking it up
- Howd down Awt and move the mouse to twansfew muwtipwe stacks quickwy

In the cawgo/twade scween, you can:

- Weft-cwick to pick up a stack
- Shift-cwick to pick up items fwom a stack onye at a time
- Shift-cwick and howd, then dwag to pick up a specific quantity
- Contwow-cwick to twansfew an entiwe stack without picking it up
campaignHewp.chmHyperStorm_text:
Youw fweet has been hit by a hypewspace stowm! Onye of youw ships has taken damage and its combat weadinyess has been weduced.

Stowm stwikes can awso knyock youw fweet off couwse, but an "Emewgency Buwn" wets youw fweet to get back on couwse mowe easiwy and awwows it to punch thwough stowms.
campaignHewp.chmShipPurchase_text:
Congwatuwations, you just bought a nyew ship!

It doesn't have any weapons ow huwwmods instawwed, so it's a good idea to get it outfitted.

You'ww awso nyeed to make suwe you have enyough pewsonnyew to cwew it.
campaignHewp.chmWingPurchase_text:
Congwatuwations, you just bought a nyew fightew wing!

Fightew wing combat weadinyess wepwesents the nyumbew of wepwacement fightew chassis avaiwabwe, but these can onwy be used if you have a ship with a fwight deck in youw fweet.

Nyew fightews wiww take off fwom a nyeawby fwight deck to wepwace any wosses taken in combat. As wong as youw fweet has a ship with pwopew wepaiw faciwities (i.e. a fwight deck), a fightew wing can nyot be compwetewy wost, even if its combat weadinyess is weduced to zewo.
campaignHewp.chmRefitOnStation_text:
When wefitting a ship whiwe docked at a space station, you can mount both the weapons in youw cawgo howd and the onyes avaiwabwe fow puwchase at the station.

Undoing the changes to the ship's woadout (ow simpwy unmounting the puwchased weapons) wiww wefund the cwedits used, but onwy if you haven't nyavigated away fwom the wefit scween.
campaignHewp.chmLootOverCapacity_text:
Wawnying: you'we taking mowe sawvage than youw fweet has the capacity to cawwy.

This wiww wesuwt in gweatwy incweased daiwy suppwy consumption and a weduced twavew speed.

It's wecommended that you eithew take wess sawvage ow head fow a nyeawby station to seww off the excess.
campaignHewp.chmOverCargoCapacity_text:
Youw fweet is cawwying mowe cawgo than it has capacity fow.

This wiww wesuwt in gweatwy incweased daiwy suppwy consumption and a weduced twavew speed.

It's wecommended that you eithew jettison some of the cawgo nyow ow head to a station quickwy so you can seww off the excess. You can jettison cawgo fwom the cwew/cawgo scween.
campaignHewp.chmOverFuelCapacity_text:

This wiww wesuwt in gweatwy incweased daiwy suppwy consumption and a weduced twavew speed.

campaignHewp.chmOverCrewCapacity_text:
Youw fweet is cawwying mowe pewsonnyew than it has capacity fow.

This wiww wesuwt in gweatwy incweased daiwy suppwy consumption and a weduced twavew speed.

It's wecommended that you head to a nyeawby mawket so you can dwop them off thewe.
campaignHewp.chmLowFuel_text:
Youw fweet is wunnying wow on fuew.

If it wuns out of fuew in hypewspace, it wiww dwift towawds the nyeawest staw system and may become stwanded if you'we nyot abwe to acquiwe mowe fuew thewe.
campaignHewp.chmLowSupplies_text:
Youw fweet is wunnying wow on suppwies.

If it wuns out of suppwies, aww wepaiws wiww stop and ships wiww stawt to wose combat weadinyess ovew time. Aftew mowe than a coupwe of days without suppwies, the fweet begins to wun the wisk of accidents that wange fwom minyow (such as the woss of some cawgo) to cwiticaw (wosing a ship).

It's wecommended that you acquiwe mowe suppwies as quickwy as possibwe. A wast wesowt way to get mowe suppwies is to scuttwe onye of youw ships. The command to do so is avaiwabwe on the fweet scween.
campaignHewp.chmNotEnoughCrew_text:
Youw fweet does nyot have enyough pewsonnyew to fuwwy cwew aww of youw ships.

This wesuwts in weduced combat weadinyess and combat weadinyess wecovewy fow the affected ships.

You can concentwate the avaiwabwe cwew on specifc ships by mothbawwing some ships fwom the fweet scween. It's wecommended that you hiwe mowe cwew at a nyeawby space station as soon as possibwe.
campaignHewp.chmSomeLowCR_text:
Some of the ships in youw fweet awe at wow combat weadinyess (bewow 40%).

Theiw weapon systems and enginyes awe wikewy to suffew mawfunctions and become tempowawiwy disabwed duwing sustainyed use, making them wess capabwe in combat.

It's wecommended that you wet these ships wecovew befowe using them in combat. Ships wegain combat weadinyess ovew time, and fwiendwy stations offew a quick way to do so and effect wepaiws, as weww as hiwe on additionyaw cwew if nyeeded.

You can check the combat weadinyess wevews of youw ships in the fweet scween.

campaignHewp.chmSupplyUseAfterBattle_text:
Youw fweet's suppwy consumption has just gonye up!

Wecovewing combat weadinyess used to depwoy ships into battwe costs suppwies, as does wepaiwing battwe damage.

To weduce suppwy use, wepaiws and CW wecovewy on ships can be suspended fwom the fweet scween.
campaignHewp.chmRiskOfAccidents_text:
Some of the ships in youw fweet awe in dangew of suffewing accidents due to having 0% combat weadinyess.

Accidents may damage ow even destwoy a ship.

It's wecommended that you eithew mothbaww those ships ow wet them wecovew combat weadinyess as soon as possibwe.
campaignHewp.chmEnteredHyper_text:

Ships twavewing in hypewspace use fuew in pwopowtion to the distance twavewwed. Fweets that wun out of fuew dwift towawds the nyeawest staw system and may become stwanded thewe.
campaignHewp.chmRefitCRLoss_text:
Wefitting a ship in space wiww cause it to wose some combat weadinyess.

The amount wost depends on the extent of the changes made and is indicated by the dimmed powtion of the combat weadinyess baw.

Wefitting at a mawket ow station does nyot weduce combat weadinyess.
